Oklahoma_City.SandRidge Center: SandRidge Center is a prominent skyscraper in the central business district of downtown Oklahoma City, in the U.S. state of Oklahoma. The tower has 30 floors and is 393 feet (120 m) tall, making it the sixth-tallest building in Oklahoma City and the eleventh-tallest in the state. It is the headquarters of gas production and exploration company SandRidge Energy Corporation.
